properties.description:
The title of the dataset/study.
Note: This is a required field.
properties.title: Title

properties.description:
Author or Authors (use the button add another author).
Please follow the convention "Lastname, Given Names."
Note: This is a required field.
properties.title: Author(s)/Creator(s)

properties.description:
The publisher of the dataset.
Note: This is a required field.
properties.title: Publisher

properties.description:
Use this option to include people or organizations who aren't considered authors, but still contributed to the work. Please follow the same convention.
Select the Add button to include another contributor.

The date on which the data or other research object was created or published.
Note: This is a required field.
properties.title: Date

properties.description:
Select a copyright license. Note that this does not directly affect embargo or permissions to view your research, which can be changed later.
While you always retain ownership of any content deposited into data.upei.ca, by selecting a license for your content you hereby grant stewardship of the content to the Robertson Library, UPEI under the site's Terms of Deposit.

options.index: Creative Commons Zero -- waive all rights and place work in public domain.
Creative Commons Attribution-NoDerivatives 4.0 -- allows free use with attribution.
Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 (CC BY) -- allows others to make derivative works.
Do not apply a Creative Commons license; deposited object remains proprietary

properties.title: Copyright/License of the Dataset

properties.description: A brief description of your dataset.
properties.title: Abstract

properties.description: Start typing to view a list of potential subject terms or enter your own.
properties.title: Subject(s)

properties.description: Start typing to view a list of potential keywords or enter your own.
properties.title: Keywords(s)

properties.description: Enter a location that best describes the geographic place or region of the data collected.
properties.title: Geographic Coverage

properties.description: Type of data included in the file, in plain language (e.g. survey data, aggregate data, GIS data). Start typing to view a list of potential types or enter your own. The default type is Dataset.
properties.title: Data Type

properties.description:
Public - Public users can access description and download/view the dataset - a DOI is created.
Embargoed - Public users can access the description, but need to contact researcher for dataset view/download - a DOI is created.
Archive -  Only Researcher/Admin can view/access - no DOI created.

options.index: Select an Access Level for your dataset.

properties.title: Access Level

properties.description: Enter the number of the grant that supported the generation of the dataset.
properties.title: Grant Number

properties.description: Start typing to view a list of potential funding agencies that supported the generation of your dataset or enter your own.
properties.title: Funding Agency

properties.description:
Use this option to add citations to articles or other publications that utilize the dataset.
Select the Add button to add another related citation.
Enter the URL to the citation.
properties.title: Citation URL
